description: Claire and Brad are about to get married. Claire sends some friends along to make sure Brad behaves himself on his bachelor party, however things spiral out of control.
keywords: simulated fellatio,sexploitation film,large breasts,cheating fiance,cheating husband
name: The Night That Never Happened

review.name: better with the sound off
review.reviewBody: I don't like to be too harsh when it comes to rating films.but this is a nightmare to sit through.The movie's only redeeming qualities lie in the undressing of the stunning Lisa Boyle,particularly her rooftop sex scene.It is a typical soft core thriller,this time revolving around Lisa's character on the run from her boss at the strip club,mixed in amongst naked bodies trying too act.Sorry people,apart from Lisa you all failed dismally.
